sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom'
import Dashboard from './components/Application/Dashboard'
import Gold from './components/Application/Gold'
import Silver from './components/Application/Silver'
import Cash from './components/Application/Cash'
import NotFound from './components/Application/NotFound'
import { Layout } from './components/Layout/Layout'
import NavBar from './components/NavBar/NavBar'
import LoginUser from './components/auth/LoginUser'
import LogoutUser from './components/auth/LogoutUser'
import RegUser from './components/auth/RegUser'

class App extends Component {
  constructor (props) {
    super(props)
    this.onAppAuthChangeInfo = this.onAppAuthChangeInfo.bind(this)
    this.state = { reload: false }
  }

  onAppAuthChangeInfo () {
    this.setState({ reload: !this.state.reload })
  }

  render () {
    return (
      <>
        <Router>
          <NavBar />
          {localStorage.token === undefined 
            ? <Switch>
              <Route path='/login'><LoginUser onAppAuthChangeInfo={this.onAppAuthChangeInfo} /></Route>
              <Route path='/register'><RegUser onAppAuthChangeInfo={this.onAppAuthChangeInfo} /></Route>
            </Switch>
            : <Switch>
              <Route exact path='/' component={Dashboard} />
              <Route path='/gold' component={Gold} />
              <Route path='/silver' component={Silver} />
              <Route path='/cash' component={Cash} />
              <Route path='/logout'><LogoutUser onAppAuthChangeInfo={this.onAppAuthChangeInfo} /></Route>
              <Route component={NotFound} />
            </Switch>}
        </Router>
      </>
    )
  }
}

export default App
